mapper.sql: MID, MNAME, MTYPE, MSTARTTIME, MENDTIME, MCOURNAME, MADDRESS, COURTYPE

mapper.update:
update K_MEETING
MNAME = #{mname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MTYPE = #{mtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MSTARTTIME = #{mstarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MENDTIME = #{mendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MCOURNAME = #{mcourname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MADDRESS = #{maddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COURTYPE = #{courtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where MID = #{mid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
